text: In MultiPCA, dataset files are masked one after the other to save memory. This is done by repeated calls to `filter_and_mask`. An easier (and more pythonic) way to do that would be to provide a masking iterator that does this job on the fly.
title: Masking iterator in NiftiMasker

text: I'm going to close this one because I can't see a clean way to do it while being in parallel.
